Text: Immigration Options after Graduation Please consider reviewing the information shared by Attorney David Gluckman on November 19, 2020, in which he discusses H-1b, Permanent Residency and other options. https://isss.umbc.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/28/2020/11/DEG-solo-Work-Options-for-Foreign-Students-w-GC-UMBC-November-2020.pdf https://isss.umbc.edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/28/2020/11/McCandlish-Holton-Immigration-Workshop-Handouts-November-2020.pdf
